dev.kkorolyov.pancake

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.GameEngine

  • public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Central game management module. Serves as the link between entities with components containing data and systems specifying business logic.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameEngine(GameSystem... systems)
      Constructs a new engine pre-populated with systems.

      Constructs a new engine pre-populated with systems.
